original: ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /

original: lha mo ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lha mo ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: cho ga sngar bshad pa dang mthun pa las gzhan du na sa bon tam dmar po las byung ba /
analyzed: cho ga sngar bshad pa dang mthun pa las gzhan du na sa bon tam dmar po las byung ba /
translated: Other than in accordance with the previously explained rite, [she arises] from a seed or a red [ta].

original: padma dmar po dang / zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dmar po dang / zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits on a seat of a red lotus and moon.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: phyag bzhi pa g-yas mi 'jigs pa /
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa g-yas mi 'jigs pa /
translated: She has four arms. The right [hands] display the boon and the red lotus.

original: g-yon autpal dmar po bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon autpal dmar po bsnams pa /
translated: The left [hands] hold a red utpala.

original: yang phyag gnyis kyis autpa la dmar po kha bye ba lta bu'i mda' dang / gzhu rna ba'i mthar thug par bkang ste /
analyzed: yang phyag gnyis kyis autpa la dmar po kha bye ba lta bu'i mda' dang / gzhu rna ba'i mthar thug par bkang ste /
translated: The other two [hands] hold an open red utpala bow and arrow drawn up to the ear.

original: bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bsams la snying gar bsnun te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bsams la snying gar bsnun te /
translated: Visualizing the one to be accomplished in front, she pierces his heart.

original: sngar bshad pa'i autpa la'i phyag rgyas snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor gtugs par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i autpa la'i phyag rgyas snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor gtugs par bya'o //
translated: With the utpala gesture previously explained, she touches his heart, forehead, throat, and crown.

original: de nas bzlas brjod bya ste /
analyzed: de nas bzlas brjod bya ste /

original: aom ku ru kulle che ge mo ba sha m'a na ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ku ru kulle che ge mo ba sha m'a na ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ kuru ku llē such and such a person vasam ānaya svāhā.

original: dbang du bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so /
analyzed: dbang du bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so /
translated: The rite of enthralling is complete.

original: // / bzlas pa'i dus su khyad par du 'od zer gyis sdig sgrib sbyangs shing gzhan dbang du byas par yang mos @264b pas so //
analyzed: // / bzlas pa'i dus su khyad par du 'od zer gyis sdig sgrib sbyangs shing gzhan dbang du byas par yang mos @264b pas so //
translated: At the time of recitation, imagine in particular that light rays purify misdeeds and obscurations and enthrall others.

original: don yod grub pas rgyas gdab bo//
analyzed: don yod grub pas rgyas gdab bo//
